titles.title: To provide that determinations relating to annuity benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employee's Retirement System for survivors of individuals separating before October 1, 1993, shall be made in accordance with applicable provisions of law, as in effect on March 31, 1993.

bill.summary: 4/7/1993--Introduced. Provides that any determination relating to annuity benefits under the Civil Service or Federal Employees Retirement Systems for survivors of Federal employees or Members of Congress separating before October 1, 1993, shall be made in accordance with applicable law in effect on March 31, 1993.
